doc.previous: Where denotes the number of combinatorial objects of size n The number of combinatorial objects of size n is therefore given by the coefficient of Some common operation on families of combinatorial objects and its effect on the generating function will now be developed The exponential generating function is also sometimes used In this case it would have the form
doc.after: Once determined the generating function yields the information given by the previous approaches In addition the various natural operations on generating functions such as addition multiplication differentiation etc have a combinatorial significance this allows one to extend results from one combinatorial problem in order to solve others
